about_the_game:
Welcome to Laniakea, a vast and immersive MMORPG experience that will transport you to a breathtaking world of wonder and adventure.

In this expansive open world, you'll embark on a thrilling journey across sprawling landscapes, bustling cities, and ancient ruins, as you explore the secrets of a richly detailed universe.

Explore a Vast Open World

Discover a vast, open world filled with hidden secrets, mysterious landscapes, and ancient ruins waiting to be uncovered. From the snow-capped peaks of the Frozen Spires to the scorching dunes of the Golden Wastes, every region is meticulously crafted to provide a unique and unforgettable experience.

Choose Your Path

Create your own legend by selecting from a diverse range of playable weapons, each with its unique abilities, playstyles, and progression paths. Will you wield the fury of the elements as a Stormcaller, or master the art of stealth as a Shadowdancer? The choice is yours.

Unleash Your Power

Unleash devastating combat abilities, summon powerful allies, and harness the power of ancient magic to dominate the battlefield. With a deep crafting system and extensive character customization options, you'll be able to tailor your experience to suit your playstyle.

Join a Thriving Community

Join a vibrant community of players, collaborate with friends to conquer challenging group content, and participate in regular events and updates that will keep the game fresh and exciting for years to come.

Key Features

Explore a vast, open world with diverse regions, each with its unique landscape, architecture, and secrets
Choose from a range of playable weapons, each with its unique abilities and playstyles
Develop your character through a deep crafting system and extensive customization options
Engage in action-packed combat with a variety of abilities, summons, and magic
Join a thriving community with regular events and updates
Get Ready for the Adventure of a Lifetime

Embark on an unforgettable journey in Laniakea, where the boundaries between reality and fantasy blur, and the fate of the world rests in your hands.

name: LANIAKEA
short_description: Laniakea, an immersive MMORPG, invites you to shape a dynamic world through player-driven economy and classless combat. Explore a vast realm, build wealth, forge alliances, and leave your legacy through thrilling PvP. Your choices will echo through the ages in this unforgettable adventure.
supported_languages:
English*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
